FuncDef:
The ipsec load-balance hash-arithmetic command configures the Hash algorithm for load balancing on an IPsec board.
The undo ipsec load-balance hash-arithmetic command restores the default settings.
By default, the Hash algorithm CRC32C is used.
CLIs: ipsec load-balance hash-arithmetic { arithmetic1 | arithmetic2 | arithmetic3 }
undo ipsec load-balance hash-arithmetic [ arithmetic2 | arithmetic3 ]
ExtraInfo:
To configure the Hash algorithm for load balancing on an IPsec board, run the ipsec load-balance hash-arithmetic command.
In level-1 load balancing scenario, configuring the Hash algorithm CRC32C is recommended.
